Dear Roselle,


Below is the recommended insurance wording.

12.9
INGIE ETOILE shall take out with a primary insurance company, and maintain in full force and effect for the entire Term of this Agreement, an adequate commercial general liability and property insurance, including worker’s compensation, employers’ liability, advertising injury, business automobile liability, umbrella liability and third-party liability insurance, and, in any event, any other insurance coverage which is mandatory under the applicable laws, it being understood that such insurance coverage shall be primary, without recourse to any insurance taken out by ETRO. INGIE ETOILE shall provide ETRO, upon ETRO’s request, with all the relevant certificates of insurance issued by each of INGIE ETOILE’s insurers with the express indication that all premiums due have been paid and that the insurance is in full force and effect. If at any time during the Term INGIE ETOILE fails to obtain insurance (or provide proof of insurance) in accordance with this Agreement,

Notes:

chunks.text:
12.9
INGIE ETOILE shall take out with a primary insurance company, and maintain in full force and effect for the entire Term of this Agreement, an adequate commercial general liability and property insurance, including worker’s compensation, employers’ liability, advertising injury, business automobile liability, umbrella liability and third-party liability insurance, and, in any event, any other insurance coverage which is mandatory under the applicable laws, it being understood that such insurance coverage shall be primary, without recourse to any insurance taken out by ETRO. INGIE ETOILE shall provide ETRO, upon ETRO’s request, with all the relevant certificates of insurance issued by each of INGIE ETOILE’s insurers with the express indication that all premiums due have been paid and that the insurance is in full force and effect. If at any time during the Term INGIE ETOILE fails to obtain insurance (or provide proof of insurance) in accordance with this Agreement,

Notes:

*	
	Commercial General Liability and Third Party Liability are the same thing
*	
	Umbrella liability cannot be mandatory. It is for very high limits of liability in excess of the commercial general liability.
*	
	Avertising injury and automobile liability are not applicable to retail store operations.

Best Regards,
Hagop
